page.title: 06FOOD OF TODAY
page.content: THERE ARE ALL KINDS OF {FOOD}TODAY .CHEESE CAKE IS ONE OF THE NICEST DESSERTS.IT IS MADE OF A CREAMY CHEESE FLAVOUR WITH SHORT CAKE AT THE BOTTOM.ANOTHER NICE FOOD IS FISH AND CHIPS.{FISH}IS USUALLY DONE IN BREAD CRUMBS OR BATTER.YOU CAN BUY FISH FROM EITHER NORMAL SHOPS AND COOK THEM AT HOME OR A FISH AND CHIP SHOP WHICH HAS THEM COOKED ALREADY. CHIPS ARE MADE OUT OF {POTATOES} .THE POTATOE IS SLICED INTO RECTANGLES TO MAKE THE SHAPE OF THE CHIPS. THOSE ARE THREE OF MY FAVOURITE FOODS.
